articles.content:
VAR has changed the Premier League for better or for worse.
While football fans are always in favour of the right refereeing decision being made, it would be fair to say that not everybody has been … [+4087 chars]

articles.author: Freddie Keighley
articles.title: El-Hadji Diouf turned up at Liverpool teammate's flat for 2am party 'with 10 women' - Mirror Online
articles.description: Former Reds defender Jon Otsemobor recalled an occasion when Diouf arrived unexpectedly in the early hours of a day they had training - and admits he felt used by his former teammate
articles.content:
Former Liverpool defender Jon Otsemobor has recalled controversial teammate El-Hadji Diouf arriving unannounced at his flat "with around 10 women".
The incident occurred in the early hours of a day … [+2634 chars]
